patched_yaml:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: nginx-ingress-controller
  labels:
    k8s-app: nginx-ingress-lb
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    k8s-app: nginx-ingress-lb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        k8s-app: nginx-ingress-lb
        name: nginx-ingress-lb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: gcr.io/google_containers/nginx-ingress-controller:0.62
        name: nginx-ingress-lb
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10249
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          hostPort: 80
        - containerPort: 443
          hostPort: 443
        args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --default-backend-service=default/default-http-backend
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true

apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: nginx-ingress-controller
  labels:
    k8s-app: nginx-ingress-lb
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    k8s-app: nginx-ingress-lb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        k8s-app: nginx-ingress-lb
        name: nginx-ingress-lb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: gcr.io/google_containers/nginx-ingress-controller:0.62
        name: nginx-ingress-lb
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10249
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          hostPort: 80
        - containerPort: 443
          hostPort: 443
        args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --default-backend-service=default/default-http-backend
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  namespace: prow
  name: tide
  labels:
    app: tide
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: tide
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: tide
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: tide
      containers:
      - name: tide
        image: gcr.io/k8s-prow/tide:v20201204-d90be1ef6b
        args:
        - --dry-run=false
        - --config-path=/etc/config/config.yaml
        - --github-token-path=/etc/github/token
        - --github-endpoint=http://ghproxy
        - --github-endpoint=https://api.github.com
        - --github-graphql-endpoint=http://ghproxy/graphql
        - --gcs-credentials-file=/etc/gcs-credentials/service-account.json
        - --status-path=gs://prow-tidb-logs/tide-status
        - --history-uri=gs://prow-tidb-logs/tide-history.json
        ports:
        - name: http
          containerPort: 8888
        volumeMounts:
        - name: github-token
          mountPath: /etc/github
          readOnly: true
        - name: config
          mountPath: /etc/config
          readOnly: true
        - name: gcs-credentials
          mountPath: /etc/gcs-credentials
          readOnly: true
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
      volumes:
      - name: github-token
        secret:
          secretName: github-token
      - name: config
        configMap:
          name: config
      - name: gcs-credentials
        secret:
          secretName: gcs-credentials

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: kube-rdma-cni-ds
  namespace: kube-system
  labels:
    tier: node
    app: rdma-cni
    name: rdma-cni
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: rdma-cni
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        tier: node
        app: rdma-cni
        name: rdma-cni
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: rdma-cni
        image: mellanox/rdma-cni:stable
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - name: cnibin
          mountPath: /host/opt/cni/bin
      volumes:
      - name: cnibin
        emptyDir: {}

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  namespace: default
  name: cherrypicker
  labels:
    app: cherrypicker
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cherrypicker
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: cherrypicker
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: ''
      containers:
      - name: cherrypicker
        image: gcr.io/k8s-prow/cherrypicker:v20211020-68b4c3bc47
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        args:
        - --github-token-path=/etc/github/token
        - --github-endpoint=http://ghproxy
        - --github-endpoint=https://api.github.com
        - --dry-run=false
        ports:
        - name: http
          containerPort: 8888
        volumeMounts:
        - name: hmac
          mountPath: /etc/webhook
          readOnly: true
        - name: github-token
          mountPath: /etc/github
          readOnly: true
        - name: tmp
          mountPath: /tmp
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
      volumes:
      - name: tmp
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: hmac
        secret:
          secretName: hmac-token
      - name: github-token
        secret:
          secretName: k8s-infra-cherrypick-robot-github-token
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault

        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      volumes:
      - name: tmp
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: hmac
        secret:
          secretName: hmac-token
      - name: github-token
        secret:
          secretName: k8s-infra-cherrypick-robot-github-token

patched_yaml:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:1.19.1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    volumeMounts:
    - name: config-volume
      mountPath: /etc/nginx
    - name: htpasswd-volume
      mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf
    securityContext:
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      runAsNonRoot: true
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi
  volumes:
  - name: config-volume
    configMap:
      name: nginx-config
  - name: htpasswd-volume
    secret:
      secretName: nginx-htpasswd

apiVersion: apps/v1

  name: echoheaders

  replicas: 1
  selector:

      app: echoheaders

patched_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: notion-gtdls
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notion-gtdls
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: notion-gtdls
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: notion-gtdls
        image: notion-gtdls:stable
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: notion-gtdls-env
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: workflows-controller
  namespace: workflows-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: workflows-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: workflows-controller
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: controller
      containers:
      - name: controller
        image: ko://github.com/nubank/workflows/cmd/controller:stable
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
        ports:
        - name: metrics
          containerPort: 9090
        env:
        - name: GITHUB_APP_ID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              name: config-github-app
              key: app-id
        - name: GITHUB_INSTALLATION_ID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              name: config-github-app
              key: installation-id
        - name: SYSTEM_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: CONFIG_LOGGING_NAME
          value: config-logging
        - name: CONFIG_OBSERVABILITY_NAME
          value: config-observability
        - name: METRICS_DOMAIN
          value: workflows.dev/workflows
        volumeMounts:
        - name: github-app-private-key
          mountPath: /var/run/secrets/github
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      volumes:
      - name: github-app-private-key
        secret:
          secretName: github-app-private-key

metadata:

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  namespace: default
  name: contacts1-migration
spec:
  initContainers:
  - name: tmp-container
    image: contacts1-server:stable
    imagePullPolicy: Always
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /atlas-migrations
      name: migrations
    command:
    - cp
    - -r
    - /db/migrations
    - /atlas-migrations
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      privileged: false
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      runAsNonRoot: true
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi
  containers:
  - name: migration
    env:
    - name: CONFIG_FILE
      value: defaults
    image: infoblox/migrate:stable
    imagePullPolicy: Always
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /atlas-migrations
      name: migrations
    command:
    - /migrate
    args:
    - --verbose
    - --source
    - file://atlas-migrations/migrations
    - --database.address
    - postgres.default:5432
    - --database.name
    - contacts1
    - --database.user
    - postgres
    - --database.password
    - postgres
    - up
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      privileged: false
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      runAsNonRoot: true
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi
  volumes:
  - name: migrations
    emptyDir: {}
